text: Raytheon Company is an American defense contractor and industrial corporation. It makes military weapons and commercial electronics. It is the world's largest producer of guided missiles.Missile maker hopes to diversify, create technology for peacetime . Sazhightechconnect.com. Retrieved on 2012-02-04. Raytheon was set up in 1922. == References == Category:Companies based in Massachusetts Category:Electronics companies of the United States Category:Military organizations
title: Raytheon
